name: misc-fix-daz3d-model-1
description: Fix the model exported from DAZ Studio (Phase 1)

scripts.auto-generate: node lib/aqgts-lib/tools/build-test-helper.js && node lib/aqgts-lib/tools/build-html.js && browserify src/global/pre-cdn.js -t babelify | uglifyjs -c -o dist/pre-cdn.js && browserify src/global/post-cdn.js -t babelify | uglifyjs -c -o dist/post-cdn.js
scripts.build: npm run auto-generate && browserify src/global/index.main.js -d -t babelify -o dist/index.main.js
scripts.build:release: npm run auto-generate && browserify src/global/index.main.js -t babelify | uglifyjs -c -o dist/index.main.js

author: aq
